Vacation Bible School 2015

July 20-25

Join us this July for an exciting time exploring both the universe and the God of the Universe! This Vacation Bible School will be held July 20-25, 6-8 PM, right at our church facility, with programs for kids, teens, and adults.

More information to come soon! To learn more or to preregister, call the church office at (518) 459-2717 or contact us via this website.
